comments: She is a good teacher and gives good feedback on your writings. She has group meetings to have others help you with your paper and I believe that it was very beneficial. If you complete her notebook homework you should be fine.

comments: She is the worst English teacher Ive ever had. She cant teach for her life. Basically you write a paper and shell tell you it sucks, the one paper was just about who are we are a writer... Im a history major. Im not a writer. Do not take her, you will hate life.

comments: She\'s a nice professor. Only thing is that students are not engaged in participating as the class itself is very boring. Other than that, I don\'t have an issue with this class.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (2)  Get ready to read (2)  Gives good feedback (2)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Participation matters (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)
comments: I hated this class. The journal entries are pointless and a waste of time. I didn\'t learn anything about my writing and I didn\'t improve either. She\'s a nice woman but her class is obnoxiously boring and useless.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (2)  Get ready to read (2)  Gives good feedback (2)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Participation matters (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)
comments: Easy A if you are already a decent writer coming into this class. If not, you may not do so well although the chapter summary project is a big part of your grade and an easy way to do well. She puts a strict limit on absences, but almost always let class out early. Definitely recommend!

tag_professor: Tough Grader (2)  Get ready to read (2)  Gives good feedback (2)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Participation matters (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)
comments: A wonderful woman & teacher. Fair & honest grader. You\'ll do well as long as you try. I would not hesitate to take her again.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (2)  Get ready to read (2)  Gives good feedback (2)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Participation matters (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)
comments: She is a great professor! Very helpful and easy to talk to. The only homework you receive is journal entries and as long as you keep up with them you are fine. Essays are interesting to write about and the class goes by very fast!

tag_professor: Tough Grader (2)  Get ready to read (2)  Gives good feedback (2)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Participation matters (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)
comments: She is an awesome teacher, very easy, she makes you do Digests which is basiclyi make outlines of chapters you review. She makes you write 4 essays, you need to have you second drat of your essay typed sometimes, and she uses turnitin.com. She\'s easy to talk to, and she\'ll help you when you need to be helped.

comments: She is pretty cool. Journal entries for pretty much every chapter. she really knows her stuff though. learned alot. make sure you do the reading. attendance is somewhat mandatory but for the most part she doesn\'t care. i\'d take her if you have a chance

comments: She is a really good teacher. Assignments seem hard at first, but she\'s extremely helpful. Have not gotten below an A on a paper. Lets class out early.
